thread.title: Celebrities flock to premiere of Chinese film 'Ash is Purest White' in Cannes

title: Celebrities flock to premiere of Chinese film 'Ash is Purest White' in Cannes
text:
Celebrities flock to premiere of Chinese film 'Ash is Purest White' in Cannes 2:27am IST - 01:26
Director Jia Zhangke walked the red carpet at the film festival with two of the film's cast members, Zhao Tao and Liao Fan. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
